#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod  8388608
/* find sum of all subset of 1 to n */
int main()
{
	int t;
	long long f[23];
	f[1] = 1;
	for(int i=2;i<23;i++)
	{
		f[i]=(i*(i+1))/2;
		for(int j=1;j<i;j++)
		{
			f[i] = (f[i] << 1)%mod;

		}
		f[i] = f[i] + f[i-1];
		f[i] %=  mod;
	}
	
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		if(n>22)
			printf("%lld\n",f[22]);
		else printf("%lld\n",f[n]);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
